title: ANSIS Digital Soil Mapping Instance Schema - Simple Object View
description: A simplified (simple JSON object) view of ANSIS Soil Samples and SOSA Observations for Digital Soil Mapping.

DSM_SoilSample.title: ANSIS DSM Soil Sample
DSM_SoilSample.description: An ANSIS Soil Sample and SOSA Observation merged and flattened into a simple JSON object that can easily converted to a CSV file.
DSM_SoilSample.$comment: Schema @id references above are informative - they link to the entities modified to create this view. Property names match as close as possible their equivalents in the ANSIS domain model.

hasGeometryX.description: X coordinate of a point, or the representative point (e.g. centroid) of a polygon or linstring.

hasGeometryY.description: Y coordinate of a point, or the representative point (e.g. centroid) of a polygon or linstring.

hasGeometrySRID.description: EPSG ID of the geoemtry's spatial reference system.

hasGeometry.$comment: Result WKT only, removed observable property object.

observedProperty@id.description: URI linking to the ANSIS domain model/observable properties vocabulary.

usedProcedure@id.description: URI linking to the ANSIS procedure vocabulary.

isSampleOf@type.description: URI linking to the ANSIS feature (entity) of interest type (horizon, etc).

sourceSample@id.description: URI linking to the source soil sample.

sourceObservation@id.description: URI linking to the source observation.

CURIE.title: Compact URI Datatype
CURIE.description: Compact URI identifying ANSIS properties or procedures. CURIE namespaces in https://anzsoildata.github.io/def-au-schema-json/schema/domain/2023-06-30/context.json.
